name: Insert Game Name
description:
WARNING

IF THE WEB VERSION DOESN'T WORK TRY THE WINDOWS - Unity WebGL being weird

DESCRIPTION

Made in 3 hours - I got an interesting idea for this so I'll definitely update this (I say for the 4th game in a row)

The player has to survive as long as they can and collect points while switching between 4 characters that share the same health. The player controls 4 Characters but can only control 1 at a time. They must switch between all the characters in order to protect them from the snow slowly falling.

CONTROLS

A - Move Left
D - Move Right
Space - Jump

F - Toggle Selected Player ( 1 > 2 > 3 > 4 )

1 - Select Red
2 - Select Blue
3 - Select Yellow
4 - Select Green

OTHERS

Thanks to vnitty for the background

My Color Scheme: https://coolors.co/cd4631-3f7cac-ffb30f-29bf12-c6c5b9
